snippet.title: 🎉Dance Dash is NOW LIVE on STEAM Early Access!🕺💃
snippet.description:
👇 Get Dance Dash on Steam TODAY! Don’t forget to grab your Trackstraps from the Dance Dash page if you want to play without trackers!

🎮Get your groove on Steam at https://bit.ly/3ECbIut 
🌟Grab your Trackstraps from https://bit.ly/3r8B8gf 

🔥Why Dance Dash is the MOST EPIC RHYTHM GAME EVER🔥

True Full-Body Tracking: Turn your living room into the ultimate dance floor!
Be the DJ: Drop your own beats and share the vibe with our free beatmap editor!
Physicality: Dance Dash enables many NEW engaging interactions like stomps, ducks, jumps, slides, dodges, slap, and more.
A World That Grooves With You: Experience a reactive, cel-shaded universe like no other!
Feet tracking Accessories: Play without trackers by using Trackstrap for controllers!

🎮Join the Dance Dash Discord Community Now at: https://discord.gg/Rz4UMrAUqA 

Don't just play the game—be a part of the Dance Dash movement! Join our Discord to connect with other Dance Dashers, get exclusive game updates, and be the first to know about our epic community events. 

👀 Stay Connected: Follow us on social media @dancedashvr and @rebuffreality for instant updates and the coolest dance-offs! 🎵

#DanceDash #vrdance  #RebuffReality #steamvr  #quest2  #index  #htcvive
